Html:
Hi. I  have a little WPF project that use this very nice framework. On this way I want to thank you very much.

Until few versions ago I used this pice of code to make a route.

MapRoute route = GMaps.Instance.GetRouteBetweenPoints(start, end, false, (int)MainMap.Zoom);
if (route != null)
{
	labelRoutePointsKM.Content = "Km=" + Math.Round(route.Distance, 2).ToString("N2");
}
where start and end are two PointLatLng
My problem is the property Distance is not available anymore.
There is another way to read this information.
The Windows Form version is more powerfull, better developed ?
Thanks a lot !
Liviu

yes it's still here, i guess you use experimental code from optimizations branch

p.s. route.Name contains length info

yes, you're right. I used the experimental code. I changed with the last Hot Build from 6 nov and the property is still there.

Thanks for route.Name tip.
